game.name: the Kind God of Wealth
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 키보드 전용 옵션, 마우스 전용 옵션, 수시 저장, Steam Cloud, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: This is a game focused on worshipping 《the Kind God of Wealth》. It offers a "homebody lifestyle" experience: unwilling to work in public, you place all your faith and hope in the gods. Pray daily to gradually transform your in-game life—upgrade your home furniture and daily necessities.
game.shortDescriptionEn: This is a game focused on worshipping 《the Kind God of Wealth》. It offers a "homebody lifestyle" experience: unwilling to work in public, you place all your faith and hope in the gods. Pray daily to gradually transform your in-game life—upgrade your home furniture and daily necessities.
